user.title: Configure CHMI Alerts
user.description: Set up CHMI (Czech Hydrometeorological Institute) weather alerts

data_description.area_filter: Filter alerts by area name or geocode (e.g., CISORP code). Matches against areaDesc and geocode tags. Leave empty to receive all alerts. See https://apl2.czso.cz/iSMS/cisdet.jsp?kodcis=65 for CISORP codes.
data_description.language_filter: Filter alerts by language code (e.g., 'en', 'cs', 'cs-CZ'). Leave empty to receive alerts in all languages.

abort.already_configured: This CHMI area filter is already configured
